name: Mt.Fuji
clues: This is an active volcano. It last erupted in 1707.
This was registered as a World Cultural Heritage Site in June 2013.
This is 3,776m. The diameter of the base is 44km. It straddles Yamanashi and Shizuoka prefectures.

name: Kit Kat
clues: This was created in England in 1935, and was sold in Japan as an imported product by Fujiya in 1973.
This is a candy made of wafers wrapped in chocolate.
IHave a break, have a ○○.It's a familiar sweet. It comes in a variety of flavors.

name: Ninja
clues: It is said to have existed from the Sengoku period to the Edo period.
You may be able to experience it at facilities in Mie Prefecture, Shiga Prefecture, Tokyo, Tochigi Prefecture, etc.
These people are the Japanese version of spies, using weapons shaped like stars.

name: Yakushima
clues: It was registered as a World Heritage Site in 1993.
Cryptomeria trees that are over 1,000 years old grow naturally there.
This place was the inspiration for the Ghibli movie released in 1997.

name: Hokkaido
clues: There is a traditional folk song that many Japanese children dance at sports days.
Original dishes such as soup curry and Genghis Khan are popular.
It's about the same latitude as Marseille in France, and about 38 times the area of ​​Tokyo.

name: Tokyo Skytree
clues: It is currently the tallest self-supporting tower in the world.
It weighs approximately 36,000 tons and has 2,500 evacuation stairs.The construction cost was approximately 65 billion yen.
The building opened in 2022. The name of this building was invented by the public.

name: Sushi
clues: The origin of this dish is actually in China, where only the rich could eat it.
The dish is arranged in various styles and eaten by many people all over the world.
It's a fast food from the Edo period. It's a Japanese dish that combines vinegared rice with fresh fish and vegetables.

name: Ramen
clues: After the Great Kanto Earthquake of 1923, this dish began to be sold at places called ``yatai.''
It is thought to be most delicious when sipped.
The dish is a noodle dish that is popular worldwide. It is known as instant noodles worldwide.

name: Sensoji Temple
clues: During its long history of about 1,400 years, it has been destroyed by fire many times, but each time it has been rebuilt, it has continued to grow and grow.
The temple is the oldest in Tokyo. It was built in the 7th century.
Kaminarimon is the symbol of this temple. Nakamise Street is about 250 meters long.

name: Shibuya
clues: There are spots where you can experience Japanese culture such as fashion and karaoke.
There is an intersection where many tourists are surprised to see pedestrians crossing the street without hitting each other.
There's a statue erected inspired by the dog's loyalty.

name: Shinkansen
clues: It does not exist in Ibaraki, Chiba, Yamanashi, Mie, Nara, Wakayama, Tottori, Shimane, Kagawa, Tokushima, Ehime, Kochi, Oita, Miyazaki, or Okinawa.
It is known for being punctual.
It is the second fastest in the world and can accelerate up to 320 km/h.
